content.intro_1: In Indiana, where President Trump visited twice in the last week, a GOP gain: Republican Mike Braun defeats Democratic Sen. Joe Donnelly. Democrat Joe Manchin holds on in West Virginia.
content.intro_2: Democrats are steadily gaining in the House.
content.bullet_1: In Florida, hotly contested races for Senate and governor remain extremely close
content.bullet_2: Here is what winning would mean for each party
content.bullet_3: Ayanna Pressley is the first African-American woman elected to the House from Massachusetts
content.bullet_4: A majority of voters say the country is on the wrong track
